figura.docs.silly.set_fly:
Allows overriding if you can fly or not.
Requires cheats.
figura.docs.silly.set_pos:
Sets your player's position.
Requires cheats.
figura.docs.silly.set_velocity:
Sets your player's velocity.
Requires cheats.
figura.docs.silly.set_rot:
Sets your player's rotation.
Requires cheats.
figura.docs.silly.set_noclip:
Sets if your player should act like a spectator.
Requires cheats.
figura.docs.silly.cheats_enabled: Returns if cheats are presently enabled.
figura.docs.silly.upload_avatar: Uploads your current avatar to cloud.
figura.docs.silly.load_local_avatar: Loads an avatar from your avatar folder.
figura.docs.silly.get_avatar_nameplate: Returns the nameplates of another avatar.
figura.docs.silly.cat: Sends meow in chat, because half of figura are cats in disguise.
figura.docs.silly.set_block:
Sets a fake block in the world.
Setting a block to nil removes the fake one.
Requires cheats (but runs on clients!)
figura.docs.silly.set_fake_blocks_enable:
Sets whether or not fake blocks are enabled locally.
Defaults to true.
figura.docs.silly.get_fake_block_info: Gets info about who placed a fake block at a position.
figura.docs.silly.set_hud_element_visibl: Sets the visibility of a hud element.
